title: Which is better, economy studies or science studies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Offcourse, economics. But the question is where do you want to spend your life, with people or for people. In economics, you mostly deal with people and their life, setting new laws and managing a country's economy. Or i would say, making an impact on Human lives indirectly. In Science, you will be busy with technologies and direct answers. You will research and do something which will have direct impact on humans. The choice is yours.
